issue.title: [JS] Error when slicing a DictionaryVector with nullable indices vector
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2233](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2233). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Falls through the checks and throws this error: https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/js/src/vector.ts#L416

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2233?focusedCommentId=16380900) by Brian Hulette (bhulette):*
